listSelection.title: Hello, and welcome to the Ludibrium Shoe Store. How can I help you today??#b

choices.text: Create Warrior shoes with a Stimulator
Create Bowman shoes with a Stimulator
Create Magician shoes with a Stimulator
Create Thief shoes with a Stimulator

dialogue.text: A stimulator is a special potion that I can add into the process of creating certain items. It gives it stats as though it had dropped from a monster. However, it is possible to have no change, and it is also possible for the item to be below average. There's also a 10% chance of not getting any item when using a stimulator, so please choose wisely.

listSelection.title: Warrior shoes? Sure thing, which kind?#b

dialogue.text: There, the shoes are ready. Be careful, they're still hot.
There, the shoes are ready. Be careful, they're still hot.
Eek! I think I accidently added too much stimulator and, well, the whole thing is unusable now... Sorry, but I can't offer a refund.
Sorry, but I have to have those items to get this exactly right. Perhaps next time.
Check your inventory for a free slot first.
